Title: Relates to final determinations of custody and visitation
Summary: Requires final orders determining custody and visitation and permanency hearings to be made within six months following the initial petition.
LawCode: Amd §240, Dom Rel L; amd §§651 & 1089, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to orders for child custody
